archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.4.1: A vulnerability assessment should be conducted, that includes determining the strength of the information security controls deployed in the target environment (e.g. those based on an existing set of controls such as the organisation's control library or equivalent).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
